---
title: "Mitchell"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(polyglotr)

data <- iris |>
    mutate(
        Sepal.Length = 1/Sepal.Length, 
        Petal.Length = log10(Petal.Length), 
        Sepal.Width = Sepal.Width^2, 
        Petal.Width = Petal.Width,
        Species = ifelse(
            Species == "setosa", "сетоза", ifelse(
                Species == "versicolor", "wielokolorowy", ifelse(
                    Species == "virginica", "dziewica", "NA"
                )
            )
        )
    )

ggplot(data, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Petal.Length, size = Species)) + 
    geom_line() +
    geom_point() + 
    geom_boxplot() +
    geom_violin() +
    geom_bin2d() +
    coord_polar()
```
